history.proof: intros P x y H. unfold locally_2d in H. destruct H as [delta H]. exists delta. intros t Ht. apply (H t y). - auto. - hfcrush depth: 3use: ball_center.

exceptions.exn: In environment P : R -> R -> Prop x, y : R delta : posreal H : forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v t : R_UniformSpace Ht : ball x delta t Unable to unify "(let (ball, _, _, _) := UniformSpace.class ?M in ball) ?M2460 ?M2461 ?M2460" with "(if Rcase_abs (y + - y) then - (y + - y) else y + - y) < delta".

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P t y)

Premises:
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
R_UniformSpace = UniformSpace.Pack R R_UniformSpace_mixin R : UniformSpace
locally_2d_1d_const_x : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
locally_2d_singleton : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> P x y
locally_2d_impl_strong : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => locally_2d P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_impl : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_and : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v /\ Q u v) x y
locally_2d_forall : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall u v : R, P u v) -> locally_2d P x y
locally_interval : forall (P : R -> Prop) (x : R) (a b : Rbar), Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> (forall y : R, Rbar_lt a y -> Rbar_lt y b -> P y) -> locally x P
locally_2d_align : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall eps : posreal, (forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> P u v) -> forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> Q u v) -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_locally : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> locally x (fun y : ?T => locally y P) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
locally_not : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : ?T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> locally x (fun y : ?T => ~ P y) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
iota_unique : forall (P : ?V -> Prop) (x : ?V), (forall y : ?V, P y -> y = x) -> P x -> iota P = x where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- CompleteNormedModule ?K]
locally_singleton : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> P x where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
Filter_prod : forall (F : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (?U -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : ?T * ?U -> Prop) (Q : ?T -> Prop) (R : ?U -> Prop), F Q -> G R -> (forall (x : ?T) (y : ?U), Q x -> R y -> P (x, y)) -> filter_prod F G P where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- Type]
filterlimi_locally_cauchy : forall f : R -> ?U -> Prop, at_left ?x (fun x : R => (exists y : ?U, f x y) /\ (forall y1 y2 : ?U, f x y1 -> f x y2 -> y1 = y2)) -> (forall eps : posreal, exists P : R -> Prop, at_left ?x P /\ (forall u v : R, P u -> P v -> forall u' v' : ?U, f u u' -> f v v' -> ball u' eps v')) < -> (exists y : ?U, filterlimi f (at_left ?x) (locally y)) where ?U : [ |- CompleteSpace] ?x : [ |- R]
locally_not' : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : ?T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> ~ P y} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
filtermapi = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => exists y : U, f x y /\ P y) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
locally_norm = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (x : V) (P : V -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball_norm x eps y -> P y : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), V -> (V -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ function_scope]
Build_Filter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun _ : T => True) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x)) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q) -> Filter F
filter_ex : forall P : R -> Prop, at_left ?x P -> exists x : R, P x where ?x : [ |- R]
Inductive filter_prod (T U : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : T * U -> Prop) : Prop := Filter_prod : forall (Q : T -> Prop) (R : U -> Prop), F Q -> G R -> (forall (x : T) (y : U), Q x -> R y -> P (x, y)) -> filter_prod F G P For filter_prod: Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted For Filter_prod: Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted For filter_prod: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope] For Filter_prod: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope _ _ function_scope]
ball_le : forall (x : ?M) (e1 e2 : R), e1 <= e2 -> forall y : ?M, ball x e1 y -> ball x e2 y where ?M : [ |- UniformSpace]
filterlim_locally_cauchy : forall f : R -> ?U, (forall eps : posreal, exists P : R -> Prop, at_left ?x P /\ (forall u v : R, P u -> P v -> ball (f u) eps (f v))) < -> (exists y : ?U, filterlim f (at_left ?x) (locally y)) where ?U : [ |- CompleteSpace] ?x : [ |- R]
iota = fun (T : CompleteSpace) (P : T -> Prop) => lim (fun A : T -> Prop => forall x : T, P x -> A x) : forall T : CompleteSpace, (T -> Prop) -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
Rbar_lt_locally : forall (a b : Rbar) (x : R), Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> exists delta : posreal, forall y : R, Rabs (y - x) < delta -> Rbar_lt a y /\ Rbar_lt y b
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [ |- Filter ?F]
ball_sym : forall (x y : ?M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x where ?M : [ |- UniformSpace]
filterlim_switch_dom : forall F1 : (?T1 -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F1 -> forall F2 : (?T2 -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F2 -> forall dom : ?T2 -> Prop, (forall P : ?T2 -> Prop, F2 P -> exists x : ?T2, dom x /\ P x) ->...-> exists l : ?U, filterlim h F1 (locally l) /\ filterlim g (within dom F2) (locally l) where ?T1 : [ |- Type] ?T2 : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- CompleteSpace]

```coq
intros P x y H.
unfold locally_2d in H.
destruct H as [delta H].
exists delta.
intros t Ht.
apply (H t y).
- assumption.
- unfold Rabs. simpl. unfold Rminus. apply ball_center.
Qed.
```

original: intros P x y H. unfold locally_2d in H. destruct H as [delta H]. exists delta. intros t Ht. apply (H t y). - auto. - unfold Rabs. simpl. unfold Rminus. apply ball_center.
